General.Name: KPJ Healthcare Bhd
General.Description: KPJ Healthcare Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the operation of specialist hospitals in Malaysia and internationally. It provides pathology and laboratory services; management and engineering maintenance services for specialist hospitals; and medical and consultancy services for eye care, as well as maintenance services for medical equipment. The company also operates a private university college of nursing and allied health; a pharmacy retail outlet; medical service provider; a dialysis and aged care center; polyclinic; assisted living care, after birth care, and rehabilitation centers; and retirement village facilities, as well as operates and manages an ambulatory care center. In addition, it engages in marketing and distributing medical, pharmaceutical, and consumer healthcare products; provision of healthcare information system and information technology related services; and rental of software and human resource information system. Further, the company provides human resource, building management, sterile, laundry, central kitchen, medical, and training services. It operates hospitals in Malaysia, Indonesia, Thailand, and Bangladesh, as well as senior and assisted living care facilities in Malaysia and senior and assisted living care facility in Australia. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
General.Address: 238 Jalan Tun Razak, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 50400
